description.value:
Torog grants his boon to ardent disciples whose embrace pain and bondage. Only by pledging themselves body and soul to the King that Crawls does Torog release them from earthly restraints.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Uncommon

Property:

You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against the slowed, immobilized, and restrained conditions.

Level 8: Gain a +2 item bonus.

Level 13: Gain a +3 item bonus.

Level 18: Gain a +4 item bonus.

Level 23: Gain a +5 item bonus.

Level 28: Gain a +6 item bonus.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Immediate Reaction)

Trigger: You become slowed, immobilized or restrained.

Effect: You teleport 2 squares and the triggering effect ends.

Level 8: 3 squares.

Level 13: 4 squares.

Level 18: 5 squares.

Level 23: 6 squares.

Level 28: 7 squares.
